values:
Have not been on here in a long time....mainly due to the fact I reached my goal but its steadily slipped away again.
Back at school, with A Levels putting more and more pressure on me it's going crazy. Finally my weight is going back down again and I've decided its going to stay down this time!!!
No more calorific crap, no more binge eating and feeling guilty. Just lots of healthy fasting, green tea and an insane amount of exercise. Wish me luck!!!

Height: 5'5
CW: 129(ewww)
GW1:115
GW2:105
GW3:90

Chrissi xxx
http://chrissi-gsy.livejournal.com/3095.html

Haven't been on this in absolute ages but have no where else to go today!
I 'm getting fatter by the day....stupid bloody summer holidays....but yesterday I began a fast and i'm doing an hour and a half of yoga every morning and then an hour jogging in the afternoon so things are looking up. Green tea has become my new favourite drink....yummy!
Prom on friday....I took my stupdily expensive dress back today because i'm not going anymore....it made me look fat and my mom is not the most encouraging. She kept telling me I looked fat in it...just because she's a stupid size 0! grr!

Defo want to lose more weight....maybe 15 pounds... by summer....and grow at least two inches taller! There you go-my two aims for the next two weeks! I will acheive it....I can exercise as much as I want and eat as little as I want easily because i'm the only one at home! Thank god for GCSE's lol!
Chrissi xxx


FN: Bloody sister! Just came and forced apple pie on me...had to eat it because she made it at school or something!
http://chrissi-gsy.livejournal.com/2983.html

Why the fuck is this happening now??
Half term is normally the perfect time to fast but at this moment in time I shoving nuts and banana chips down my throat!! I've got green tea and everything but today's just been shit and this whole fortnight has been shit. I haven't been allowed on any of theses sites or anything and now I've gone and gained weight like crazy!!!

I wanna be skinny by the time I go back to school but at this rate i'll be a bigger blob!!
God I hate my life this sucks so much I feel so depressed ands unhappy!!!
Grrrr I even just finished a box of ten candy canes!!! What a fat pig am I!!!
Shit i need to take a deep breath and fuckin calm down but I cant!!!

Dont worry ignore above rant!!!
http://chrissi-gsy.livejournal.com/2696.html

Shit, this sucks!!! I just dont know what's happened this week!!!
I used to be able to fast really well and lose tons and not even crave food but now I just have no willpower. I can't even stop my cravings and i'll manage to go without food until school ends and then I pig out!!!!! Grrr shit this sucks!!!!!
Tomorrow i'm going to try so fuckin hard and just drink so much water!!!!
*rant over*
Chrissi
http://chrissi-gsy.livejournal.com/2454.html

well havn't eaten anything today but tomoz I have to cook a chocolate gateau  with fudge sauce for my GCSE cooking exam!! It's gonna be like a zillion calories per slice and we HAVE to eat it to pass! Not to mention my teacher already thinks I have problems!!!Grrr
Recently found this:

punckiemunckie
Age: 15
Height: 5'5
Heighest Weight: 140lbs
Lowest Weight: 110lbs
Current Weight: 125lbs
Current Goal Weight : 105lbs
Fave food : Dunkin donuts and cereal
Fave Drink : Green tea and diet coke
Fave Exercise : Gymnastics and spinning
Thinspo : Skinny celebs and my ultra skinny friends
Where do you slip up? When I'm depressed or if I have lots of h/w etc
When did it start? about a year and a half ago
Why did it start? Depression, insomnia, friends etc
Does Anyone know? not really except one amazing mate
Do you want help? no! They'll make me eat and get fatter!
Diet pills?  tried once but not anymore
fave binge food: health bars and ice cream
Fave dieting food: Fruit, veg and rice cakes
How many cals do you consume a day? Like about 350 a day!Msainly about 450
Are you in a relationship? yup
If so, Do they pressure you to be thin? Nope, not really
Are you the fat or thin one out of your friends? the fatish one
Are you depressed? yes
Do you self harm? quite a bit
Ever tried to commit suicide? once but not since
Ever been to a psychologist? yes, mom still makes me but I dont hardly talk to her!!! My tutor keeps trying to talk to me but i ignore her!
http://chrissi-gsy.livejournal.com/2214.html

Grrrrr!!!!Who the bloody hell do my friends think they are!!?!?!?! They just keep going on and on and on about me eating and stuff and it's so frustrating! One of them even told my teacher today because she was trying to force me to eat and i'm like it's none of her fuckin business!!! 
Took a lot of sweet talk to convince said teacher not to ship me to the nurse!!!Oh well, haven't eaten anything today so yey!!!
At least I can rant and rave on here lol!
*toddles off again*
http://chrissi-gsy.livejournal.com/1850.html

Wow I'm really surprised. Apart from a packet of sugarfree gum and some water I haven't eaten today and I'm not even hungry!!! I think this might be a good sign!
Well school tomorrow so I wont have to eat or anything! Should make it easier because my friend's haven't really noticed or anything so it's cool! Makes my life easier lol!
Chrissi
http://chrissi-gsy.livejournal.com/1605.html

Yey I feel so uch better today!!
All i've had is about three litres of water and a cup ofd black coffee this morning!!
Stepped out of the shower and onto the scales and had lost 2 pounds!!! Yey!!! :):):):):):)
Oh well last day of freedom tomorrow before shcool! *Will go shopping!* Is a good excuse to get out of the house, not eat and tell my mom I ate loads in town so I dont need dinner!!
http://chrissi-gsy.livejournal.com/1482.html

Well here I am on my fourth day of fasting.
All I ate yesterday was:
Two bottles of water
Two sticks of sugar free gum 
And one piece of lemon.

I'm actually really happy with myself but I woke up this morning and without thinking I went straight into the kitchen and made a bowl of cereal because I was so hungry. Luckily I realised what I was doing and tipped it into the bin. Now I'm occupying myself with this so I dont get hungry or feel like eating!!
Chrissi
http://chrissi-gsy.livejournal.com/1028.html

Meh feeling pretty down right now after a sad TV programme. Meh.....Selena died!!
Haven't eaten all day and surprisingly I'm not feeling hungry!!! Lots of water!!
Finally my friends got back from Holiday so I wont be so tempted to eat anything...i'll be too busy and I get nervous eating in front of people!
Overall an ok day!
Chrissi xXx
http://chrissi-gsy.livejournal.com/864.html
